data.name: Aquacity
data.detailed_description:
Check this out

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1580030/Gnomepunk/


About the Game





Dive into the sunken world. Face the dangers of the deepness. Build a colony and make it thrive. Conquer or explore the unknown, you decide which way you choose.


Find food, treat the water, and provide electricity. Let scientists research and the military to fight, take in citizens to start a new underwater life.


In this alien environment, not everything is as simple as on the surface. Collect resources to expand your colony, discover new technologies and bring them to life. Generate energy so machines can work for people. Getting food and clean water may prove to be more difficult than it sounds.


Use new technologies to create bio-mechs that will help you survive. Catch creatures and bio-modify them, giving them unprecedented possibilities.


Remember that you are not alone. It's a huge world full of all kinds of creatures, from small fish to giant monsters that threaten your colony. Be watchful!

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500 / AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-7700K / AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
